summary:
- **Buy-back Type**: Other (Nasdaq-listed Class A/B common stock repurchase, no ASX-listed CDIs affected).  
- **Program Size**: Up to **US$1 billion** (aggregate of Class A/B shares).  
- **Execution**: Open market repurchases via Morgan Stanley & Co. LLC; no fixed price (USD-denominated).  
- **Progress Update (as of 13/06/2025)**:  
  - Total repurchased: **US$685.1M** (of US$1B authorization).  
  - Latest daily buy-back (13/06/2025): **6,574 shares** at **US$206,401.25** (avg. ~US$31.39/share).  
  - Remaining buy-back capacity: **US$314.9M**.  
- **Reason**: Shareholder value enhancement.  

*Note: No material impact on ASX-listed securities (NWSAB CDIs excluded from program).*
